DataElement.preferredName: Center for Epidemiologic Studies Depression Scale Other Person Same Feelings Weekly Frequency Decrease Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A self-test that measures depressive feelings and behaviors within the general population - I felt that I was just as good as other people during the past week.
